fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select 9 players. One will be attacked, one will be roleblocked, one will be Consigliere checked, one will be blackmailed, one will be framed, one will be cleaned whenever they die, one will receive incorrect night feedback, one can't vote the next day, and one is converted to the Mafia.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You don't choose what happens to who.
